Uses of Class
org.apache.freemarker.core.ConfigurationException

  • Packages that use ConfigurationException 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)

    • Uses of ConfigurationException in org.apache.freemarker.core

      Subclasses of ConfigurationException in org.apache.freemarker.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConfigurationSettingValueStringException
      Thrown by Configuration.setSetting(String, String); The setting name was recognized, but its value couldn't be parsed or the setting couldn't be set for some other reason.
      class  UnknownConfigurationSettingException
      Thrown by Configuration.setSetting(String, String); The setting name was not recognized.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core that throw ConfigurationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Configuration.setSetting(String name, String value) 
      void Configurable.setSetting(String name, String value)
      Sets a FreeMarker setting by a name and string value.
      void Configurable.setSettings(Properties props)
      Set the settings stored in a Properties object.
